body_html:
No luck: //bazel_pip/tensorflow/contrib/layer_norm:layer_norm_fused_test.

InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): No OpKernel was registered to support Op 'LayerNormCustom' with these attrs.  Registered devices: [CPU], Registered kernels:
  <no registered kernels>

	 [[Node: LN/LayerNormCustom = LayerNormCustom[T=DT_FLOAT, epsilon=1e-12, _device="/device:CPU:0"](Const)]]
